newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Zambia invites bids for ZCCM technical unit.
newsitem.headline: Zambia invites bids for ZCCM technical unit.

text.p: Zambia Consolidated Copper Mines Ltd (ZCCM) and the Zambia Privatisation Agency (ZPA) on Tuesday invited pre-qualification bids for the copper producer's technical consulting service unit, Techpro Mining and Metallurgy.
Techpro provides services to ZCCM and international mining and metals processing companies.
The deadline for pre-qualification bids is October 7, according to an advertisement placed in the South African press.
The ZPA earlier this month invited pre-qualification bids for key ZCCM mining assets.
Zambia produced around 380,000 tonnes of copper last year, making it the world's seventh largest producer. The government hopes copper output will treble following privatisation.
